entry.title: sfewer-r7/CVE-2023-27532
entry.summary:
Exploit for CVE-2023-27532 against Veeam Backup & Replication

CVE-2023-27532

Proof of Concept code to exploit CVE-2023-27532 and either leak plaintext credentials or perform remote command execution.

Overview

For a detailed analysis of the vulnerability and exploitation please read the Rapid7 AttackerKB Analysis.

Building

Open in Visual Studio. You will need to either add or update the references to Veeam.Backup.Common.dll, Veeam.Backup.Interaction.MountService.dll, and Veeam.Backup.Model.dll. To make things easier, install Veeam Backup & Replication on the development machine, although this is not a hard requirement.

Usage

Leak the plaintext credentials from the remote server.

> VeeamHax.exe --target 192.168.0.100

Run an arbitrary command with local system privileges on the remote server.

> VeeamHax.exe --target 192.168.0.100 --cmd calc.exe

Credits

Previous research into this vulnerability was performed by:

  • CODE WHITE GmbH
  • Huntress
  • Y4er

entry.title: indiff/qttabbar
entry.summary:
Qttabbar is a small tool that allows you to use tab multi label function in Windows Explorer. https://www.yuque.com/indiff/qttabbar

  • QTTabBar Document
  • æ±‰åŒ–GitHub modify by indiff
  • Generate chm db document(Support Group By Module) modify by indiff

Introduction ä¸­æ–‡ç‰ˆæœ¬

  1. Qttabbar domestic optimized version is based on sf.net/projects/qttabbar/ (2012-06-17). The original author of this version has not released it. I don't know why. Adding some Chinese features is mainly for the convenience of domestic users; in addition, the capture window of quizo official website maintained by Japanese authors is not used to all the time, so this version retains the easy-to-use function of capture window.
  2. Qttabbar is a small tool that allows you to use tab multi label function in Windows Explorer. Since then, there are no windows folder and awesome folder preview functions, which greatly improves the efficiency of your work. It's like IE 7, and it's like Firefox and opera. Qttabbar also provides some plug-ins, such as file operation tool, tree directory, display status bar and so on.
  3. Install qttabbar Windows11
  4. Dark Mode for Windows11
  • GitHub Mirror
  • Gitee Mirror
  • SourceForge Mirror

Changes

  • 1.5.5.9-beta(2023)ðŸ’¥ Capture to select,fix preview text encoding.
  • 1.5.5.8-beta(2022)ðŸ’¥ No Plugins Mini Version
  • 1.5.5.7-beta(2022)ðŸ’¥ Adapts to dark mode and supports setting background pictures
  • 1.5.5.6-beta(2022)ðŸ’¥ Support Language (Brazil Spanish French Turkish)
  • 1.5.5.5-beta(2022)ðŸ˜Š Enable debug log/Adjust the windows DPI
  • 1.5.5.4-beta(2022)ðŸ˜Š Ignore control panel capture
  • 1.5.5.3-beta(2021)ðŸ˜Š Add SetHome Tool/Add language Portuguese of Brazil Latest
  • 1.5.5.2-beta(2021)ðŸ˜Š Add built-in German; Fix version number error
  • 1.5.5.1-beta(2021) Gewidmet deutschen Freunden, deutsches Installationspaket (Google Translate)
  • 1.5.5(2021) Fix the known problem. Fix the Explorer crash after clicking the option; Add plug-in mouse suspension activation label
  • 1.5.4(2021) All plug-ins are built-in by default, which support one click to enable and one click to disable; fix the lock function bug
  • 1.5.3(2020) Add custom button image, support button skin function; add new function, support new tab, take the path of the clipboard by default; add video preview image function
  • 1.5.2(2020) Repair open command prompt exception; Exception log add extended information prompt; add language configuration file
  • 1.4(2020) Adjust version information, fix hotkey conflict, create empty file, and load two plug-ins automatically by default
  • 1.3 Update plug-ins to achieve de duplication, sorting function
  • 1.2 Support win10, fix link failure
  • 1.1 The installation interface supports Sinicization
  • 1.0 Built in Chinese Language Options

Download

  • qttabbar Latest version
  • qttabbar Chinese mirror

Usage

  • Please install net framework 3.5 Download
  • Run the installation package file to install qttabbar
  • Explorer > View > Options - > (qttabbar & buttons)[win10]
  • In Explorer, organization > layout > menu bar [xp,win7]
  • Right click the blank area on the right side of the menu bar - > check qttabbar and other toolbars - > Press Alt + m - > Restart Explorer or restart the computer
  • Error log path C:\Users\Administrator\AppData\Roaming\QTTabBar\QTTabBarException.log
  • Setting for Windows 11

Build

  • Install wix311.exe
  • Install wix visual Plugin
  • Install visual studio 2010 Baidu Pan
  • Git pull NotifyPropertyWeaverVsPackage.vsix
  • Qttabbar Project Add Referrence Ricciolo.Controls.TreeListView, Path QTTabBar\Resources\Ricciolo.Controls.TreeListView.dll

Problems

  • Tutorial
  • Open option flashback solution revision
  • New folder refresh to see the solution
  • Capture Windows

Preview
